mapper.select: SELECT CS_NO AS csNo, DECODE(CS_GRADE,'0','관리자','1','회원','탈퇴') AS csGrade, CS_ID AS csId, CS_PS AS csPs, CS_NM AS csNm, CS_PHONE csPhone, CS_EMAIL csEmail, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, CS_ADDR_ONE AS csAddrOne, CS_ADDR_TWO AS csAddrTwo, CS_BIRTH_YEAR AS csBirthYear, CS_BIRTH_MONTH AS csBirthMonth, CS_BIRTH_DAY AS csBirthDay FROM CUSTOMER_INFO WHERE CS_ID = #{csId}
